content: Who would win in a real race, a cheetah or a snail?

In a real race, a cheetah would undoubtedly win against a snail. Cheetahs are known for their incredible speed and are considered the fastest land animals, capable of reaching speeds up to 70 miles per hour (about 112 kilometers per hour). On the other hand, snails are very slow, typically moving at a pace of about 0.03 miles per hour (approximately 0.05 kilometers per hour). The difference in their speeds is so vast that the cheetah would finish the race long before the snail even gets started.
